basics.name: Kristian Soares
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: Aspiring Computer Engineer with experience in software development, embedded systems, and data structures. Passionate about problem-solving, low-level programming, and optimizing system performance. Currently pursuing a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii, expected to graduate in Fall 2025.

work.summary: Manage and maintain security access systems, integrating software and hardware solutions to enhance security infrastructure.
highlights: Developed automation scripts to streamline system maintenance and monitoring.
Collaborated with IT teams to ensure seamless integration of access control solutions.
Conducted troubleshooting and system upgrades to improve reliability and security.

projects.name: VIP Aerospace Technologies: Ke Ao CubeSat
projects.description: Developed flight software for a 1U CubeSat, implementing embedded systems programming and RF communication protocols.

projects.name: Animal Farm (EE205)
projects.description: Implemented data structures such as linked lists and binary search trees in C++. Developed sorting algorithms and container classes.
